attributes.action: Only allow people with a IQ of over 75 to have Internet Access
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many stupid people are allowed to have unmonitored Internet Access to websites and forums and spoilt the experience for the rest of us.  Users should have to pass an IQ test before being allowed access to a Computer Keyboard.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
